entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Fundy (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:28 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fundy Park (Alma) 01:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: -1.6°C
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -6.5°C
Wind: SSE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy or freezing rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to freezing rain or ice pellets late in the morning then to rain in the afternoon. Fog patches developing in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 6. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 10 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 after midnight. Temperature rising to 10 in the evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.summary: Rain. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
